specializations.description: Specialized in the treatment of musculoskeletal injuries and disorders in horses.
Expert in equine soft tissue surgery, focusing on surgical procedures related to injuries and diseases.
Extensive knowledge in the diagnosis and treatment of internal diseases in horses, including metabolic disorders and respiratory conditions.
Post-graduate qualification in equine physiotherapy, specializing in rehabilitation and recovery strategies for horses.

academicQualifications.description: Doctorate specializing in equine medicine, with a thesis on the use of Doppler in digital ultrasonography for horses with Laminitis.
Specialized in physiotherapy and rehabilitation techniques for horses.
Master’s degree focusing on management and business strategies in veterinary practices.

certifications.awardedBy: Royal College of Veterinary Surgeons of London, University of Liverpool
certifications.description: Certified in equine internal medicine, focusing on advanced diagnostics and treatment.

certifications.awardedBy: Royal College of Veterinary Surgeons of London, University of Liverpool
certifications.description: Certified in equine soft tissue surgery, focusing on non-invasive and minimally invasive techniques.

certifications.certificate: Spanish Certification in Equine Clinical Medicine
certifications.description: Certification in equine clinical medicine, recognizing proficiency in equine health management.

certifications.certificate: Board Eligible in European College of Equine Internal Medicine (ECEIM)
certifications.description: Board eligibility for advanced specialization in equine internal medicine.

research.thesisTitle: Doppler in Digital Ultrasonography in Horses with Laminitis
research.description: Research focused on improving diagnostic techniques for Laminitis using Doppler technology in equines.

professionalExperience.description: Professional stints in specialized equine hospitals and clinics, gaining hands-on experience in advanced equine medicine.
